name: asciidoctor-chunker
description: Splits asciidoc book's single HTML file generated by Asciidoctor into chunks by chapters, sections, and subsections.

scripts.sample: cd test/resources; make single; cd -; node src/index.mjs test/resources/output/single/sample.html -depth 2:4,3:2 -o test/resources/output/html_chunks
scripts.manual: cd example; make single; cd -; node src/index.mjs example/output-single/single/user-manual.html -o example/output-chunk/html_chunks
scripts.clean: make clean; cd test/resources; make clean; cd ../../example; make clean; cd -

author: Wataru Shito (@waterloo_jp)
